tool_description: Get all the recent news about the covid-19 pandamic from major media outlets
title: covid-19 news

api_list.name: Get all covid-19 news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the recent news about covid-19 from all the news outlets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://covid-19-news5.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "covid-19-news5.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
